pageContext.title: Solitary

front.name: Solitary
prompts: Keep moving even when hope is lost

back.name: Solitary
back.desc:
//"You've left yourself alone too long" -- Tana
Without experiencing what other people in your life can do, you may fear what you need most from them: an outlet. When you act distant, others will reciprocate.
prompts: Leave others behind to fend for themselves
back.rule: Flip when a prompt is narrated by anyone.
